thread.title: Perfect, Superb, Excellent ...
thread.title_full: Perfect, Superb, Excellent ... - Review of Hotel Villa Saxe Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: amallas
title: Perfect, Superb, Excellent ...
text: My experience with the hotel staff started prior to our arrival due to my requests to prepare the room with various flowers & balloons as a surprise for my girlfriend, they had everything perfectly ready which was a great surprise and good start to our holiday. The breakfast was on point with everything needed to have a full breakfast with lovely pastries, small crepes and eggs. The service was exceptional with every request we had no matter what time. The hotel is perfectly located away from all the loudness of Paris as its behind the Eiffel tower, but you are still close to everything. The hotel provided us with amazing memories, I could not thank them more . 5 stars
